fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Inquire someone at night, revealing if they are a Heretic.
- Vanquish someone at night, killing them. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you will learn three roles in the game that will be labelled Heretics, but not who has these roles. At least two of these roles must be opposing factions.
- You will learn when a Heretic dies.
- Inquire cannot be deceived by any frames or disguises.
- If you Vanquish someone that isn't a Heretic, you will lose all charges.
- You cannot Vanquish until Night 2.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see your Heretics fall.
